hero.title: About MarHire
hero.subtitle: Welcome to MarHire, your all-in-one travel companion in Morocco from the vibrant streets of Marrakech to the beaches of Agadir, the historic alleys of Fes, and beyond. We are more than just a travel platform. We are a bridge between curious travelers and the finest local experiences Morocco has to offer.

story.title: Our Story & Vision
story.lead: MarHire was founded by two engineers with a passion for travel who saw how hard it was to plan Morocco the right way: scattered providers, hidden fees, and uneven quality. We built MarHire to fix that — one reliable place to book trusted local services at fair prices, with clear policies and real human support.
story.visionLead: Their vision was simple yet powerful:
story.quote: Morocco's best local experiences should be easily accessible to everyone without middlemen, confusion, or guesswork.
story.details: That vision guides everything we do. We verify every partner, standardize policies, and surface real availability across cars, private drivers, boats, and activities so you can compare options, book in minutes, and focus on your trip. Many rentals require no deposit, pricing is transparent, and support is multilingual (English/French/Arabic) and truly 24/7 via WhatsApp, phone, or email.

items.q: Entry & Visa Basics
items.a: Many travelers can enter Morocco visa-free or with an eVisa for short stays. Always check the latest requirements with the Moroccan consulate and ensure your passport is valid for the duration of your trip.

items.q: Money & Payments in Morocco
items.a: The local currency is MAD (dirham). ATMs are common in cities; cards work at larger hotels and shops, but cash is preferred in markets and taxis. Keep small bills for tips and avoid dynamic currency conversion—pay in MAD.

items.q: Car Rental Essentials (Morocco)
items.a: Your home-country license is usually accepted; an International Driving Permit is recommended. Confirm insurance and roadside assistance, and check deposit vs. no-deposit options.

items.q: Getting Around & Airport Transfers
items.a: Pre-book a private driver for fixed pricing and meet-and-greet at arrivals, or use official taxi stands. Trains and intercity buses connect major cities; plan extra time during peak seasons.

items.q: Safety, Etiquette & Common Scams
items.a: Morocco is generally safe; use licensed guides/drivers and be cautious with unsolicited helpers. Dress modestly near religious sites, ask before photographing people, and keep valuables secure.

features.verifiedDesc: All agencies are screened and approved.

cancellation.title: Free Cancellation
cancellation.description: Lock in this price today, cancel free of charge up to 6 hours before pick-up to get 100% refund.

carRentalDetailed.heroSubtitle: Experience the freedom to explore Morocco at your own pace. Rent quality cars with unlimited mileage, no deposit, and airport pickup for hassle-free adventures.

whyChoose.q: Why choose MarHire for car rental?
whyChoose.a: MarHire partners with trusted local agencies to offer transparent pricing, no hidden fees, unlimited mileage, and free airport pickup.

requirements.q: What do I need to rent a car?
requirements.a: You need a valid driver's license (international for visitors), be over 21 years old, and a credit card for booking.

insurance.a: Yes, all our rentals include basic insurance. Additional coverage is also available for extra peace of mind.

fuel.a: Cars are delivered with a full tank and must be returned with a full tank. Gas stations are widely available.

privateDriverDetailed.heroSubtitle: Travel with comfort, safety, and style. Book a professional, multilingual private driver for your Morocco airport transfer, city tours, business trips, or multi-day excursions with fixed, all-inclusive pricing.

whyChoose.a: Our drivers know the best routes, speak multiple languages, and provide local commentary while driving safely.

languages.a: Most of our drivers speak Arabic, French, and English. Many also speak Spanish and other languages.

vehicles.q: What type of vehicles do they use?
vehicles.a: Our fleet includes comfortable sedans, SUVs, and minivans, all air-conditioned and well-maintained.

pricing.a: We offer fixed, transparent pricing with no hidden charges. Prices include driver, fuel, and mileage.

boatsDetailed.heroSubtitle: Discover Morocco's coastline from the water. From luxury yachts to sunset cruises, find the perfect boat experience with experienced captains and guaranteed safety.

whyChoose.q: Why choose MarHire for boat rentals?
whyChoose.a: We partner with licensed marine operators who prioritize safety, have well-maintained vessels, and know the best local waters.

safety.q: What safety measures are in place?
safety.a: All boats come with complete safety equipment, certified captains, and weather monitoring to ensure safe trips.

included.a: Rentals include captain, fuel, safety equipment, and basic refreshments. Meals and additional activities can be arranged.

weather.q: What if the weather is bad?
weather.a: We monitor weather conditions closely. Trips can be rescheduled or fully refunded for safety reasons.

activitiesDetailed.heroSubtitle: Immerse yourself in Morocco's rich culture and adventures. From desert quad rides to surf tours and camel experiences, discover authentic Moroccan adventures.

whyChoose.a: We curate experienced local operators who offer authentic experiences, prioritize safety, and provide genuine cultural insights.

difficulty.a: We offer activities for all levels, from beginners to experienced adventurers, with proper guidance and instruction.

safety.a: All operators follow strict safety protocols, provide proper equipment, and have experienced guides to ensure your safety.

group.a: Absolutely. Many activities offer group pricing and can be customized for special occasions or corporate events.

handpicked.title: Handpicked, Reviewed Listings

bookNowPayLater.title: Book Now, Pay Later

blog.title: From Our Travel Blog

items.q: What makes MarHire different from other travel booking websites?
items.a: MarHire is a Morocco-based platform that offers handpicked services from verified local providers. Unlike international platforms, MarHire guarantees no hidden fees, personalized local support, and listings carefully reviewed for safety, reliability, and authenticity. You're not just booking a service - you're experiencing Morocco like a local.

items.q: Can I really rent a car in Morocco without a deposit?
items.a: Yes, MarHire offers many options with no deposit required, particularly for economy and family cars. These listings are clearly marked, giving travelers peace of mind and more flexibility, especially if you prefer to pay on arrival or in cash.

items.q: Are the private drivers on MarHire trustworthy and professional?
items.a: All private drivers are vetted, multilingual, and trained to deliver exceptional service. They not only transport you but also offer cultural insights, local recommendations, and flexible itineraries. Whether it's a business trip or a desert tour, you're in safe hands.

items.q: How does MarHire ensure the quality of its services?
items.a: Every car, boat, and tour is listed by a licensed local agency and reviewed manually. We gather real customer feedback and continuously update listings to maintain high standards. Transparency and quality are our priorities.

items.q: What is included when I book with MarHire?
items.a: Booking usually includes the main service (car, driver, tour, or boat), insurance, and add-ons like Wi-Fi, fuel, or water when available. Each listing page specifies exactly what is included, so there are no surprises.

requirementsDocs.title: Requirements & Documents
requirementsDocs.subtitle: To ensure a safe and trustworthy marketplace for travelers, we require all our partners to be licensed and fully compliant with local regulations. Before applying, please have the following documents ready:

companyRegistration.title: Company Registration
companyRegistration.desc: Valid ICE (Identifiant Commun de l'Entreprise) and RC (Registre du Commerce) numbers.

businessLicense.title: Business License
businessLicense.desc: Proof of your specific business license (e.g., transport touristique, location de voitures).

ownerId.title: Owner's Identification
ownerId.desc: A copy of the owner's national ID card (CNIE) or passport.

serviceDetails.title: Service Details
serviceDetails.desc: Clear information about your services, including pricing, cancellation policies, and insurance details.

requirementsDocs.footnote: Submitting these helps us speed up the verification process and build a foundation of trust. For more details, review our partner terms.

commissions.title: Fair Commissions & Fast Payouts
commissions.subtitle: Our business model is simple: we grow together. We've designed our financial system to be transparent, fair, and beneficial for our partners.

transparentCommission.title: Transparent Commission
transparentCommission.desc: You only pay a competitive, fixed commission on confirmed bookings. No hidden costs, ever.

monthlyPayouts.title: Reliable Monthly Payouts
monthlyPayouts.desc: Receive your earnings automatically every month via secure bank transfer.

performanceDashboard.title: Performance Dashboard
performanceDashboard.desc: Track your bookings, view earnings reports, and get insights to optimize your listings.

items.q: How long does the approval process take?
items.a: Our goal is to review and approve new partner applications within 24-48 hours. Once we verify your documents and services, we'll begin building your listing right away.

items.q: What are the fees or commission rates?
items.a: MarHire operates on a transparent, commission-based model. You only pay a small percentage when you get a confirmed booking. There are no sign-up fees or monthly costs. For detailed rates, please see our commissions page or contact us.

items.q: How and when do I get paid?
items.a: We process partner payouts on a monthly basis via secure bank transfer. You can track all your bookings, earnings, and payout statements directly from your partner dashboard.

items.q: Can I edit my pricing and availability?
items.a: Yes. You have full control over your listings. You can update pricing, block out dates, and manage availability easily through your dedicated partner dashboard at any time.

items.q: How can I pause my listings if I'm fully booked?
items.a: You can temporarily disable or pause any of your listings directly from your partner dashboard with a single click, preventing new bookings until you're ready to reactivate.

items.q: What are your support hours for partners?
items.a: We provide dedicated partner support via WhatsApp and email. Our team is based in Morocco and is available to assist you with any questions or urgent issues 7 days a week.

items.q: Is there a long-term contract?
items.a: No, we believe in flexible partnerships. You can join MarHire without any long-term commitment and can choose to remove your listings at any time, as outlined in our partner agreement.

items.q: How is my business and customer data handled?
items.a: We take data privacy seriously. All data is handled in compliance with our Privacy Policy. Your business information is secure, and we only share what's necessary to facilitate bookings.

items.q: Can I list my services in multiple cities like Agadir and Marrakech?
items.a: Absolutely. If you operate in multiple locations across Morocco, you can create and manage listings for each city under a single partner account.

items.q: I'm already on other platforms. Is it easy to list with MarHire?
items.a: Yes, our team makes it simple. Just provide us with your service details, and we'll handle the initial setup to get your listings live on MarHire quickly and efficiently.

contactHelp.title: Have Questions Before You Join?
contactHelp.subtitle: Our partner onboarding team is ready to help. Reach out to us directly for any inquiries.

items.q: What payment methods do you accept?
items.a: We offer flexible payment options. You can pay securely online with most major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, etc.). For many services, a 'Pay on Delivery' option is also available, allowing you to pay in cash when you meet your provider.

items.q: Are there any hidden fees?
items.a: No. MarHire is committed to transparent pricing. The total price you see at checkout includes all mandatory fees and taxes. Any optional add-ons are clearly stated.

items.q: Do I need to pay a deposit for my booking?
items.a: It depends. Many car rentals are available with a no-deposit option, which may include a small surcharge. For luxury vehicles or specific partners, a refundable security deposit may be required on your credit card at pickup. Check each listing for details.

items.q: How do I change or cancel my booking?
items.a: Since we don't have user accounts yet, all changes and cancellations are handled by our support team. Please contact us via email or WhatsApp with your booking reference number.

items.q: When will I receive my refund after a cancellation?
items.a: Once a refund is approved according to the booking's policy, we process it immediately. It typically takes 5-10 business days for the funds to appear back on your original payment method.

items.q: Do you offer discounts for longer rentals?
items.a: Yes, many partners offer reduced daily rates for longer car rental periods (e.g., 7+ days). The discount is automatically calculated and reflected in the total price when you select your dates.

items.q: How do I get an invoice for my booking?
items.a: You will receive a confirmation email that serves as a detailed receipt. If you require a formal invoice, please contact our support team with your booking reference.

items.q: Is it safe to pay online?
items.a: Absolutely. Our payment processor is fully PCI-compliant and uses industry-standard encryption. We never store your full credit card details on our servers.

items.q: What is included in my car rental?
items.a: Standard rentals include basic insurance (CDW), third-party liability, and local taxes. The mileage policy (e.g., unlimited kilometers) often depends on the rental duration; always check the listing details.

items.q: What are the age and license requirements?
items.a:
The minimum age is usually 21, but can be 23 or 25 for certain cars. You must have held your valid driving license for at least one year. 
➤ **Tip:** We strongly recommend carrying an International Driving Permit (IDP) to avoid any issues.

items.q: Can I have the car delivered to my airport or hotel?
items.a: Yes, airport and hotel delivery is a standard service. Many partners offer free delivery within their city limits. Any applicable fees are shown on the listing.

items.q: What is the fuel policy?
items.a: Our standard policy is 'Same-to-Same.' You receive the car with a certain level of fuel and are expected to return it with the same amount to avoid extra charges.

items.q: Can I rent a car in one city and return it in another?
items.a: Yes, one-way rentals between major Moroccan cities (e.g., Marrakech to Fes) are possible. This service may incur a one-way fee. Cross-border travel outside Morocco is not permitted.

items.q: What should I do in case of a breakdown or accident?
items.a: First, ensure everyone is safe. For any accident, you must contact the police to get a report (*constat*), as it is required for insurance. Then, call the 24/7 roadside assistance number on your rental voucher.

items.q: How do airport transfers work?
items.a: Your professional driver will monitor your flight and wait in the arrivals hall with a sign bearing your name. The price for your airport transfer is fixed, so you don't have to worry about traffic or extra costs.

items.q: Are the drivers multilingual?
items.a: Yes, our private drivers are professionals who typically speak multiple languages, including French, Arabic, and English. Some also speak Spanish or German; check the driver's profile for details.

items.q: Can I book a driver for a city-to-city transfer?
items.a: Absolutely. We offer comfortable intercity transfers, such as from Marrakech to Agadir or Casablanca to Rabat. It's a great way to travel between cities without the hassle of public transport.

items.q: What about luggage, child seats, and waiting time?
items.a: Each vehicle has a specified luggage capacity. Child seats can be requested in advance. For airport transfers, a standard waiting time (usually 60 minutes) is included for free.

items.q: How do I change my pickup time or location?
items.a: To make any changes to your private driver booking, please contact our support team via WhatsApp or email as soon as possible, and we will coordinate with the driver.

items.q: How do I pay for my private driver?
items.a: Similar to our other services, you can book your private driver or airport transfer in Morocco by paying securely online or choosing a 'Pay in Cash' option where available.

items.q: What's included in a boat rental or activity?
items.a: This varies, but typically includes safety equipment, a guide/skipper, and necessary gear. For boat rentals, the fuel policy will be specified. Always check the 'What's Included' section on the listing page.

items.q: What happens if there's bad weather?
items.a: Safety is our priority. If a boat trip or outdoor activity is cancelled by the provider due to bad weather, you will be offered the choice to either reschedule or receive a full refund.

items.q: Can I book a private boat trip or tour?
items.a: Yes, many listings for boat rentals and activities in cities like Marrakech or Agadir are available as private experiences, allowing you to customize the itinerary with the provider.

items.q: Are there age limits or safety measures for children?
items.a: Most activities are family-friendly, but some may have age or height restrictions for safety. Life jackets, including child sizes, are provided for all boat trips. Please check the listing details.

items.q: Is hotel pickup available for activities?
items.a: Many tours and activities include complimentary pickup and drop-off from centrally located hotels. You can verify this on the listing page and provide your hotel details during checkout.

items.q: How do I cancel or change an activity booking?
items.a: To cancel or modify your activity, please contact our support team. Be sure to check the cancellation policy on your booking confirmation, as cutoff times may vary.

items.q: What documents do I need at pickup?
items.a: For car rentals, you'll need your driving license, passport/ID, and booking voucher. For all services, the lead booker should have an ID. An International Driving Permit (IDP) is highly recommended for driving.

items.q: Who is responsible for traffic fines, tolls, and parking?
items.a: The renter is fully responsible for all traffic fines, road tolls, and parking fees incurred. Unpaid fines will be charged by the rental agency, often with an administrative fee.

items.q: What are my insurance options?
items.a: All car rentals include basic third-party liability and CDW with an excess (deductible). You can often upgrade to a 'full protection' package at the rental desk to reduce or eliminate this excess.

items.q: How is my personal data handled?
items.a: We only collect data necessary to complete your booking. For full details, please read our Privacy Policy.

items.q: Where can I find the full terms of service?
items.a: All bookings are subject to our platform rules. You can review our complete Terms & Conditions for more information.

items.q: What if I have a complaint or an issue with a provider?
items.a: Your satisfaction is our priority. Please contact MarHire support immediately. We will act as a mediator to help resolve the situation with the local partner fairly and efficiently.

items.q: What is the best way to contact you?
items.a: For urgent issues, the fastest way is via WhatsApp. For general questions, changes, or cancellations, you can email us at info@marhire.com.

items.q: What are your support hours?
items.a: Our support team is available 7/7, from 09:00 to 21:00 (Morocco Time, GMT+1).

items.q: What is the difference between general and emergency support?
items.a: General support handles bookings and questions during business hours. Emergency support (via the number on your voucher) is for immediate, on-the-road issues like breakdowns and is available 24/7.

items.q: How long does it take to get a response?
items.a: We pride ourselves on fast responses. WhatsApp messages are typically answered within minutes, while emails are answered within a few hours during our support window.

bottom.title: Can't find your answer?
bottom.textPrefix: Our team is ready to help. Contact us at
bottom.supportHours: Support Hours: 7/7, from 09:00 to 21:00 (Morocco Time, GMT+1)

footerCta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey with MarHire?
footerCta.text: Join hundreds of successful partners and start growing your business today.

about.title: About our partner
about.default: Your reliable choice for car rentals in Morocco. We offer a modern fleet and professional service.

depositPayment.title: Deposit & Payment
depositPayment.text: No-deposit is available on many economy cars. A standard refundable security deposit on a credit card may be required for premium vehicles, as stated on the listing.

fuelPolicy.title: Fuel Policy
fuelPolicy.text: The standard policy is 'Same-to-Same.' You receive the car with a certain level of fuel and are expected to return it with the same amount to avoid refueling charges.

kmPolicy.title: Kilometer Policy
kmPolicy.text: Unlimited kilometers are typically included for rentals of 3 days or more. Shorter rentals may have a daily limit (e.g., 250km/day), which will be specified on the listing.

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.text: A valid driver's license (held for at least one year), your passport/ID, and the MarHire booking voucher. An International Driving Permit (IDP) is highly recommended.

changes.title: Booking Changes & Cancellations
changes.text: All changes and cancellations must be handled through MarHire's central support team. Please contact them via WhatsApp or email with your booking reference number. Cancellation policies are displayed on the listing page.

cars.title: Deposit & Payment
cars.text: No-deposit is available on many economy cars. A standard refundable security deposit on a credit card may be required for premium vehicles, as stated on the listing.

cars.title: Fuel Policy
cars.text: The standard policy is 'Same-to-Same.' You receive the car with a certain level of fuel and are expected to return it with the same amount to avoid refueling charges.

cars.title: Kilometer Policy
cars.text: Unlimited kilometers are typically included for rentals of 3 days or more. Shorter rentals may have a daily limit (e.g., 250km/day), which will be specified on the listing.

cars.title: Required Documents
cars.text: A valid driver's license (held for at least one year), your passport/ID, and the MarHire booking voucher. An International Driving Permit (IDP) is highly recommended.

cars.title: Booking Changes & Cancellations
cars.text: All changes and cancellations must be handled through MarHire's central support team. Please contact them via WhatsApp or email with your booking reference number. Cancellation policies are displayed on the listing page.

boats.title: Captain & Crew
boats.text: Most of our boat and yacht rentals include the services of a professional, licensed skipper and crew for your safety and convenience. This will be clearly stated on the listing.

boats.title: Bad Weather Policy
boats.text: Safety is our absolute priority. If the captain determines that sea conditions are unsafe, you will be offered the choice to reschedule for another day at no cost or receive a full refund.

boats.title: Fuel Inclusion
boats.text: For standard half-day or full-day tours, a basic fuel allowance is included. For private, customized charters, fuel may be charged based on consumption at the end of the trip.

boats.title: Food & Beverages
boats.text: You are typically welcome to bring your own snacks and drinks. Some luxury charters offer catering packages as an optional add-on. Please check the listing for details.

boats.title: Booking Changes & Cancellations
boats.text: All changes and cancellations must be handled through MarHire's central support team. Please contact them via WhatsApp or email with your booking reference number. Cancellation policies are displayed on the listing page.

drivers.title: Pricing Model
drivers.text: The price is per vehicle for the agreed-upon service (e.g., airport transfer, day trip), not per person. It includes the driver, vehicle, and fuel costs.

drivers.title: Airport Transfers
drivers.text: Includes flight monitoring by the driver. They will wait for you in the arrivals hall with a sign bearing your name, even if your flight is delayed.

drivers.title: Luggage Capacity
drivers.text: Each vehicle has a specified luggage capacity. Please inform MarHire support at the time of booking if you have excess or oversized luggage to ensure a suitable vehicle is provided.

drivers.title: Multi-day & Intercity Tours
drivers.text: For multi-day tours, the quoted price typically includes the driver's accommodation and meals. All details will be confirmed before booking.

drivers.title: Booking Changes & Cancellations
drivers.text: All changes and cancellations must be handled through MarHire's central support team. Please contact them via WhatsApp or email with your booking reference number. Cancellation policies are displayed on the listing page.

activities.title: Guides & Instructors
activities.text: All activities are led by official, licensed local guides or certified instructors who are experts in their field and prioritize your safety and enjoyment.

activities.title: Hotel Pickup & Drop-off
activities.text: Many tours include complimentary pickup from centrally located hotels. Please verify on the listing page if this service is available for your accommodation and provide details during checkout.

activities.title: Safety & Equipment
activities.text: All necessary safety equipment (e.g., helmets, life jackets) is provided and meets local standards. Any age or physical restrictions will be clearly noted on the listing.

activities.title: What to Wear
activities.text: We recommend comfortable clothing suitable for the activity. For desert tours, closed-toe shoes are required. Specific recommendations will be provided on your booking voucher.

activities.title: Booking Changes & Cancellations
activities.text: All changes and cancellations must be handled through MarHire's central support team. Please contact them via WhatsApp or email with your booking reference number. Cancellation policies are displayed on the listing page.

moreDetails.title: More details
moreDetails.default: We pride ourselves on transparent pricing with no hidden fees and flexible options like no‑deposit rentals on many economy cars. Our team provides 24/7 support to keep you moving.

contactCta.title: Ready to book or have a question?
contactCta.subtitle: Contact MarHire support for assistance with any listing from this partner.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answerFallback: Contact our support if you need more details about this question.
items: What documents do I need to pick up my vehicle?
Can you deliver the car to the airport or my hotel?
How do I change or cancel my booking?
Can I rent a car in one city and return it in another?
Ready to book or have a question?

flexible.title: Flexible Chauffeur Services
flexible.desc: Book by the hour, for a specific trip, or for multi-day tours across Morocco.
